articles.title: American astronauts and Russian cosmonauts to travel together to International Space Station under new agreement - ABC News

articles.title: SpaceX rockets to fly Russian cosmonauts with new NASA deal - CNN International
articles.description: American and Russian astronauts will once share space aboard the same spacecraft after NASA and its Russian counterpart, Roscosmos, reached a ride-sharing agreement Friday following months of back-and-forth discussions.

articles.title: American tourists splurge in Paris boutiques as euro slides - Reuters.com
articles.description: American tourist Shawna Wilson says she has splashed out on four dresses at the high-end LVMH-owned department store La Samaritaine in Paris, tempted by the prices as the euro reached parity with the U.S. dollar.
